post.body: make up your mind if you wanna follow me or not fam. i like your music. i was planning on hollering at you about that
great post from cham, but what's the solution? people will always want to get signed and be famous. what's supposed to change?
because we use them so much even when we don't need them the most
i'm using this break to get back into producing myself. gotta cook up some beats for that 'the link below' album i told you about
i can. how would we go about that over the internet though?
i haven't worn full body thermals since kindergarten my nig, haha
marvin, marvin, you were a friend of mineeee. you stood for something ohhh. tupac, biggie, ohhh how we miss you soooo
hey i just started following you and then i see you have a link to my blog as your last update. random
i'm the ultimate bret easton ellis stan. reading glamorama right now in fact. glad to see somebody else who respects his work
oh shit! 1970's Fever is on the History Channel
reading and writing for the rest of the day. i think...
the titans are out here embarrassing the steelers. damn!
prison break is still on tv?
the worst thing about being home has to be random, unnecessary ass chores. fuck i need to vacuum the stairs for?
honeycrisp apples are the GOAT fruit
so oprah's considering a move to d.c. to be closer to obama? http://tinyurl.com/84ku5t
i don't feel like pulling out my macbook, but blogging from my fam's vista equipped pc is almost unbearable
why is atl always on in black households? decent movie but i cringe watching evan ross try to act like he's from the hood
oh, excuse me for asking a question on twitter and not being a famous rapper
I loved death proof. should I cop planet terror? need answers quickly
